subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Rita Benson LeBlanc, who occupies a unique place in the National Football League because of her job title, age and sex, is expected to inherit the New Orleans Saints from her grandfather, Tom Benson.
snippet: Rita Benson LeBlanc, who occupies a unique place in the National Football League because of her job title, age and sex, is expected to inherit the New Orleans Saints from her grandfather, Tom Benson.
